content.en: Sleep Apnea Technologies: Researchers have been investigating various devices and algorithms to accurately detect and diagnose obstructive sleep apnea. These include the Bedbugg™ device, actimetry, a diagnostic algorithm, the Apnea Risk Evaluation System (ARES™) Unicorder, the ApneaLink™ portable recording device, the Watch-PAT 100, a single-channel nasal pressure device, the WatchPAT 200, a non-contact bed-mounted sensing device, an oximetry-based wireless device, the WatchPAT device, an automated algorithm, the Nox-T3 device, and a novel algorithm. These technologies aim to improve the evaluation, diagnosis, and management of sleep apnea, providing more accurate and convenient methods compared to traditional polysomnography.
content.da: Søvnapnøteknologier: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige enheder og algoritmer for nøjagtigt at opdage og diagnosticere obstruktiv søvnapnø. Disse omfatter Bedbugg™-enheden, aktimetri, en diagnostisk algoritme, Apnea Risk Evaluering System (ARES™) Unicorder, ApneaLink™ bærbar optagelsesenhed, Watch-PAT 100, en enkelkanals næsetryk-enhed, WatchPAT 200, en kontaktfri sengemonteret sensorenhed, en oximetri-baseret trådløs enhed, WatchPAT-enheden, en automatiseret algoritme, Nox-T3-enheden og en ny algoritme. Disse teknologier sigter mod at forbedre evalueringen, diagnosen og håndteringen af søvnapnø ved at tilbyde mere nøjagtige og praktiske metoder sammenlignet med traditionel polysomnografi.
